patch 8.1.0036: not restoring Insert mode if leaving prompt buffer with mouse

Problem:    Not restoring Insert mode if leaving a prompt buffer by using a
            mouse click.
Solution:   Set b_prompt_insert appropriately. Also correct cursor position
            when moving cursor to last line.
attachments.title: patch 8.1.0036: not restoring Insert mode if leaving prompt buffer wi
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.0036: not restoring Insert mode if leaving prompt buffer with mouse

Problem:    Not restoring Insert mode if leaving a prompt buffer by using a
            mouse click.
Solution:   Set b_prompt_insert appropriately. Also correct cursor position
            when moving cursor to last line.

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.1.0037: cannot easily append lines to another buffer

Problem:    Cannot easily append lines to another buffer.
Solution:   Add appendbufline().
attachments.title: patch 8.1.0037: cannot easily append lines to another buffer
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.0037: cannot easily append lines to another buffer

Problem:    Cannot easily append lines to another buffer.
Solution:   Add appendbufline().
